name: Samsung Galaxy Tab S6 Lite 10.4" 128GB Android Tablet with Exynos 1280 - Graphite
specs: The Samsung Galaxy Tab S6 Lite is your super carryable note-taking, go-getting companion. It features a large 10.4 inch display on a slim and light build, One UI on Android, and S Pen in box and ready to go. Whether you're drawing, learning, or gaming, this is the tablet made for all the things you enjoy.
10.4-inch touchscreen with minimal bezel and 2000 x 1200 WUXGA+ native resolution delivers next-level brilliance, crispness, and colour
Built-in 128GB of flash memory and built-in memory card reader with up to 1,000GB of capacity provide a great storage space
2GHz Exynos 1280 processor and 4GB of RAM boost your productivity so you can knock out projects at super speed
Integrated Wi-Fi 802.11 a/b/g/n/ac (2.4GHz+5GHz) VHT80 MIMO and Bluetooth allow for a reliable and efficient wireless connectivity
7,040mAh capacity battery provides long-lasting power for hours of productivity

8MP FHD rear camera and 5MP FHD front camera, both with 1920 x 1080 resolution, provide more options to record great videos, capture incredible photos, and to enjoy video calls with friends and family
Enjoy an impromptu private screening in the park or binge watch in bed with dual speakers in landscape orientation that deliver rich, 3D sound
Included S Pen stylus features low latency and impressive pressure sensitivity so you can control presentations, take note, and create drawings with that pen-on-paper feeling
When taking notes, you can jot first and change colours later. Quickly sort through memos when you save with searchable tags. Even write directly onto PDFs to cut the study clutter
Magnetic holder on the tablet holds the stylus securely so that there is no chance of S pen getting misplaced

name: Apple iPad Pro 11" 128GB with Wi-Fi (4th Generation) - Space Grey
specs: The Apple iPad Pro gives you the ultimate iPad experience. Featuring a powerful Apple M2 chip and 11-inch Liquid Retina display, it boasts astonishing performance and incredibly advanced displays, and superfast wireless connectivity. Powerful new features come with iPadOS 16.
Apple M2 chip can handle multiple applications at the same time so you can seamlessly accomplish your tasks
Face ID allows you to easily unlock your device, as well as enhances security and privacy
Dual Camera System with 10MP ultra wide camera and 12MP wide camera helps you take the exciting photos or videos
LiDAR Scanner takes augmented reality to the next level by creating depth mapping points that work with the cameras and motion sensors
4K video recording allows for vivid, stunning recordings
Five studio-quality microphones gives you quality sound recordings
Support for Apple Pencil 2nd generation (sold separately)
Support for Magic Keyboard with trackpad and Smart Keyboard Folio (sold separately)

name: Apple iPad Air 11" 128GB with Wi-Fi (6th Generation) - Purple
specs: The redesigned 11-inch Apple iPad Air is supercharged by the incredibly fast Apple M2 chip. It features a stunning Liquid Retina display, a new landscape camera perfect for FaceTime and video calls, and superfast Wi-Fi 6E. And it works with the new Apple Pencil Pro and Magic Keyboard (each sold separately), so you can multitask, study, work, play, and create from anywhere.
The gorgeous Liquid Retina display features advanced technologies like P3 wide colour, True Tone and ultralow reflectivity, which make everything look stunning
M2 chip lets you multitask smoothly between powerful apps and play graphics-intensive games
With all-day battery life, you can keep working and playing wherever you go
Get 128GB of storage for your apps, music, movies and more
iPadOS makes iPad more productive, intuitive and versatile. With iPadOS, run multiple apps at once, work alongside collaborators with Freeform, and edit and share photos
Stage Manager makes multitasking easy with resizable, overlapping apps and external display support
iPad Air comes with essential apps like Safari, Messages and Keynote, with over a million more apps available on the App Store
Apple Pencil Pro transforms iPad Air into an immersive drawing canvas and note‑taking device. Apple Pencil (USB-C) is also compatible with iPad Air
Magic Keyboard features a great typing experience and a built‑in trackpad, while doubling as a protective cover for iPad
Landscape 12MP Ultra Wide front camera supports Center Stage for videoconferencing or epic Portrait mode selfies

name: Samsung Galaxy Tab S9 FE+ 12.4" 128GB Android Tablet with Exynos 1380 - Grey
specs: A universe of possibilities awaits with the Samsung Galaxy Tab S9 FE+ tablet. Conquer every task, from your passion project to your to-do list, with a powerful processor and an expansive 12.4" screen. Let your imagination run loose with the included S Pen that allows you to draw and write by hand with that pen-on-paper feeling. Plus, the powerful battery charges fast and keeps you going.

With a large 12.4" screen, there’s plenty of room to follow your passions, whether you're taking an online photography class, unwinding with cat videos or playing your favourite word game (Actual viewable area is 12.3" due to the rounded corners)
Dual speakers make everything sound amazing
Collaborate easily with a camera that automatically adjusts to keep the focus on you
With a large display that can open up to three apps at once, you can multitask while you video chat (Only in 16:9 FHD resolution)

An IP68 rating makes S9 FE+ tablet one of the only water-and dustresistant Galaxy tablet (Consistent with IP68 rating, water resistant in up to 5 feet of water for up to 30 minutes. Rinse residue / dry after wet)
Built to last wherever you use it, making it a great choice for first-time tablet buyers
With a tablet this powerful, portable and fun, you’ll want to go for hours and hours with a longlasting battery (Requires 45W wall charger (sold separately))
Get a full charge in less than an hour and a half with Super Fast Charging
With included S Pen, write notes by hand, draw a comicstrip, or mark up a document
S Pen features a responsive design that feels like you’re writing on actual paper so nothing gets in your way when your imagination is flowing

specs: The redesigned 11-inch Apple iPad Air is supercharged by the incredibly fast Apple M2 chip. name: Lenovo Tab M8 (4th Gen) 8" 32GB Android 12 Tablet w/ MediaTek Helio A22 4-Core Processor - Arctic Grey - Only at Best Buy
specs: Get yourself the Lenovo Tab M8 (4th Gen) for ultimate entertainment while on the go. It packs an 8" IPS display for viewing crisp and vibrant visuals, and powered by a MediaTek processor that delivers speedy performance in everyday tasks. Thanks to its durable battery, this tablet will keep you connected and entertained during long journeys and road trips.
Eight-inch IPS touchscreen display with native resolution of 1280 x 800 pixels and narrow bezels on two sides captures your gaze with vibrant and crystal-clear visuals
32GB internal flash storage can be increased up to 128GB with an external microSD card for storing images, videos, documents, and other data
2.0GHz MediaTek Helio A22 quad-core processor with 2GB LPDDR4x RAM provides smooth and responsive performance for completing all your tasks in time
Integrated (802.11ac) Wi-Fi and Bluetooth 5.0 for connecting to high-speed networks and pairing with compatible Bluetooth devices for file sharing and audio streaming
One USB-C port for charging and data transfer, and one 3.5mm headphone/mic combo jack for connecting to a speaker or wired headphones
5100mAh battery provides up to nine hours of entertainment and productivity without needing to recharge
Preinstalled with bilingual Android 12 (Go Edition) operating system, which provides access to a wide range of apps on its Google Play Store
5MP rear autofocus camera and 2MP front camera provide excellent image clarity for shooting video content, capturing memorable moments, or making video calls
Built-in speaker gives you crisp and rich audio while playing games, communicating on calls, or watching videos

name: Lenovo Tab M11 11" 64GB Android 13 Tablet with MediaTek Helio G88 8-Core Processor - Luna Grey
specs: Unlock a new level of mobile productivity and entertainment with the Lenovo Tab M11 64GB Android 13 tablet. Featuring a MediaTek Helio G88 octa-core processor and 4GB LPDDR4x RAM, this tablet delivers smooth multitasking and responsive performance. The integrated ARM Mali-G52 MC2 GPU ensures stunning visuals and immersive streaming on the 11-inch IPS display.
11-inch IPS display with 1900 x 1200 native screen resolution makes sure that every image and video is presented with stunning precision and vibrancy
64GB of built-in storage offers ample space for all your apps, games, and media
microSD compatibility supports cards with a maximum capacity of 1,000GB to allow storage of more of your favourite content on-the-go
MediaTek Helio G88 octa-core processor and 4GB LPDDR4x RAM deliver seamless performance and lightning-fast responsiveness for multitasking, gaming, and more
Wi-Fi 5 (802.11ac) 1 x 1 and Bluetooth 5.1 ensure fast and reliable wireless connections for seamless browsing, streaming, and connectivity to other devices
Headphone jack allows you to connect your headphones or earphones for private listening pleasure anytime, anywhere
Two-cell 7,040mAh battery guarantees 10-hour battery life for uninterrupted entertainment or productivity
Android 13 operating system offers enhanced features, improved performance, and a seamless user experience
8MP front camera and 8MP rear camera ensure sharp and detailed selfies, video calls, and photos wherever you go
Features Accelerometer (G) sensor, Ambient Light Sensor (ALS), Gyroscope sensor, and Hall sensor for enhanced functionality and intuitive interaction

name: Lenovo Tab M10 10.6" 64GB Android 12 Tablet with MediaTek Helio G80 8-Core Processor w/ Case - Storm Grey - Only at Best Buy
specs: Stay equipped and entertained anywhere, anytime with this Lenovo Tab M10 10.61-inch tablet. It is powered by MediaTek Helio G80 processor and 4GB LPDDR4x RAM for highly efficient performance. The 64GB built-in storage capacity and up to 1,000GB of maximum memory card capacity help to meet all your file storage needs. The tablet is preinstalled with Android 12 operating system.
10.61-inch screen with 2000 x 1200 native resolution provides clear and bright pictures
Built-in 64GB flash memory and built-in microSD memory card reader (up to 1,000GB of maximum capacity) offer plenty of space for storing files and media
2.0GHz, eight-core MediaTek Helio G80 processor and 4GB LPDDR4x RAM combine to deliver efficient performance
Wi-Fi 802.11ac 1 x 1 and Bluetooth 5.0 provide reliable options for wireless connectivity
Up to 12 hours of approximate battery life makes you worry less about recharging and related hassles
Preinstalled with Android 12 that features easy user interface and enhanced system performance
8MP rear and front camera let you capture good quality shots
Built-in speaker provides great sound quality
Headphone jack and integrated microphone let you have a clear, hassle-free conversations
Optional pen lets you easily write or draw on the screen (sold separately)

name: Lenovo IdeaPad Duet 3 128GB ChromeOS Tablet w/ Keyboard (SnapDragon 7c 8-Core) - Storm Grey - Only at Best Buy
specs: The Lenovo IdeaPad Duet 3 tablet is the ideal device for everyday work and play. With a larger 11-inch 2K nearly borderless display and faster connectivity, you'll have an all-day battery life and access to everything you need right there in a neat little package. This Chromebook is made to be on the move with you!
The 11" 2K near-borderless display offers a sleek design you'll love
The Snapdragon 7c is fanless and powerful, offering an all-day battery
Get everything you need to do while on the go with the Gen 2 Compute Platform
Take notes and sketch using the optional stylus pen or work on the detachable keyboard, making this super convenient for work and school
